com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.cache

Interface CacheMonitorMXBean

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CacheMonitor

    public interface CacheMonitorMXBean
    JMX interface monitoring and invalidating caches as needed.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getCacheSize()
      Returns the number of entries in all monitored caches.
      List<CacheStats> getCacheStatsList()
      Returns a list containing a CacheStats instance for each monitored cache.
      long getEvictionCount()
      Returns the number of times an entry has been automatically evicted.
      long getHitCount()
      Returns the number times cache lookup methods have returned a cached value.
      long getLoadExceptionCount()
      Returns the number of times cache lookup methods threw an exception while loading a new value.
      long getLoadSuccessCount()
      Returns the number of times cache lookup methods have successfully loaded a new value.
      long getMissCount()
      Returns the number of times cache lookup methods have returned an uncached value, or null.
      long getTotalLoadTime()
      Returns the total number of nanoseconds the cache has spent loading new values.
      long invalidateCaches()
      Invalidates all entries in all caches.
      long invalidateTenantCaches(String tenantId)
      Invalidates all caches of the given tenant.
      long invalidateUserCaches(String tenantId, String userName)
      Invalidates all caches of the given user.

    • Method Detail

      • invalidateCaches

        long invalidateCaches()
        Invalidates all entries in all caches.
        Returns:
        The number of invalidated cache entries.

      • invalidateTenantCaches

        long invalidateTenantCaches(String tenantId)
        Invalidates all caches of the given tenant.
        Parameters:
        tenantId - The tenant to invalidate all caches for.
        Returns:
        The number of invalidated cache entries.

      • invalidateUserCaches

        long invalidateUserCaches(String tenantId,
                          String userName)
        Invalidates all caches of the given user.
        Parameters:
        tenantId - The Id of the tenant for which all user caches should be invalidated.
        userName - The name of the user for which all caches should be invalidated.
        Returns:
        The number of invalidated cache entries.

      • getCacheSize

        long getCacheSize()
        Returns the number of entries in all monitored caches.
        Returns:
        The number of all entries.

      • getHitCount

        long getHitCount()
        Returns the number times cache lookup methods have returned a cached value.
        Returns:
        The number of successful cache lookups.

      • getMissCount

        long getMissCount()
        Returns the number of times cache lookup methods have returned an uncached value, or null.
        Returns:
        The number of cache lookup misses.

      • getLoadSuccessCount

        long getLoadSuccessCount()
        Returns the number of times cache lookup methods have successfully loaded a new value.
        Returns:
        The number of successful loads of new cache entries.

      • getLoadExceptionCount

        long getLoadExceptionCount()
        Returns the number of times cache lookup methods threw an exception while loading a new value.
        Returns:
        The number of exceptions thrown while loading new values.

      • getTotalLoadTime

        long getTotalLoadTime()
        Returns the total number of nanoseconds the cache has spent loading new values.
        Returns:
        The total time spent loading new values, in nanoseconds.

      • getEvictionCount

        long getEvictionCount()
        Returns the number of times an entry has been automatically evicted.
        Returns:
        The number of automatic eviction of entries.

      • getCacheStatsList

        List<CacheStats> getCacheStatsList()
        Returns a list containing a CacheStats instance for each monitored cache.
        Returns:
        A list of one stats object pre cache.
